name: B.I.T
description:
** B.I.T is a wonderful Rougelike+TPS game
Your mission is to save the whole galaxy from the threaten of the horrific T.I.B weapon. During the adventure of each planet, you will meet various formidable enemies. Fighting with them by exploring and finding powerful weapons and items, you will finally become the hero.
Multiverse traveling, abundant contents, diverse endings, hidden facts and so on, you will enjoy a wonderful experience.

** B.I.T is a game full of challenges.
Saving the world is far away from a simple task. You have to be carefully prepared for everything. You also need sufficient patience. Then you will get a interesting and fascinating experience.

** B.I.T is a game you can’t stop once you start playing it.
There are so many secrets in the galaxy. With carefully exploring, you will find clues to the trues. Every character and every NPC have their own stories. And so many things waiting you to collect. What are you waiting for? Start the discovery trip right now.

If you are unable to download or install the game, please follow this instruction to solve the problem:
1. Enter [iTunes & App Store] in [Settings].
2. Click [Apple ID] on the top, then select [View Apple ID].
3. Click [Pre-Orders], choose BIT, and click  [Cancel].
4. Go back to the App Store to retrieve the game.
